title: Call-a-Technician Admin Portal
summary: Web admin platform for jobs, invoices, technicians, and scheduling.
highlights: Implemented job creation, technician assignment, and automated pricing logic
Invoice management with job-invoice syncing and consistency checks
Dashboards and KPI cards for real-time tracking
Team of 5; one of two full-stack engineers

title: Balance 3D
summary: Physics-based 3D ball-balancing game with 12 levels (previously on Google Play Store).
highlights: Designed mechanics, animations, and levels end-to-end

title: Space Exploration 3D (ATL Space Challenge)
summary: Educational solar system exploration app with interactive 3D planet models.
highlights: Implemented planet models, animations, and interactive navigation
Added scientific details to enhance learning value
